        public int save(int userId,
                java.lang.String name)
        Method to save account to database
        Parameters:
        userId - userid of the user that the account belongs to
        name - username of the user that the account belongs to

        returns account number of the saved account

      • transfer

        public AccountDTO transfer(AccountDTO from,
                           AccountDTO to,
                           int amount)
        Method to transfer balance from one account to another
        Parameters:
        from - account that is sending the balance
        to - account that is receiving the balance
        amount - amount which is being transferred
        Returns:
        returns the updated account which received the transfer
